name: Rocky Mountain Defense Drone
effect: When this drone is placed adjacent to your mech, it creates a Line 5, 3 High shimmering shield that blocks line of sight for enemy actors, but not allied actors. The Line is centered on the drone who may be attacked, though it benefits at all times from Hard Cover. The shield lasts until the drone is destroyed or the scene ends.
